package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Xaw3d 3D Xaw toolkit Library
package-manager.vendor: Kaleb Keithley, D. J. Hawkey Jr.
package-manager.description: The Xaw3d toolkit is intended to be a general-purpose replacement for the Athena (Xaw) toolkit. In general, you should be able to link almost any Athena-based application to this Xaw3d Athena toolkit, for a three-dimensional appearance on most of the widgets.

item.para: Install Tip.h and TipP.h header files
Enable I18N support for all platforms
Rebuild to correctly included any pre-processing flags used by imake, such as -DNARROWPROTO, to work around usage issues on some platforms
